cast.name: 谢拉·麦克康米克 Sierra McCormick
哈兰德·威廉姆斯 Harland Williams
埃莉萨·多诺万 Elisa Donovan
麦克斯·查尔斯 Max Charles
塔克·阿尔布里齐 Tucker Albrizzi
查尔斯·亨利·维森 Charles Henry Wyson

introduction: 《恐怖狗狗》(Spooky Buddies)是迪士尼"狗狗＂系列在2011年推出的作品，也是一部以直接发行影音产品方式首度推出的作品，最早宣传初期的英文片名原本还有一个副标题《Spooky Buddies: The Curse of the Halloween Hound》，但后来正式产品封面曝光时，迪士尼把原本片名的副标给拿掉了。先前在2009年狗狗们推出《圣诞狗狗》(Santa Buddies)，叙述圣诞节的故事，还带出了新角色 Santa Paws，甚至后来在2010年还推出以新角色 Santa Paws 所主演的衍生作品《全面搜寻圣诞狗狗》(The Search for Santa Paws)。如今，狗狗们的新作品即将来到另一个节庆－－万圣节！在《恐怖狗狗》片中，随着万圣节的到来，狗狗们来到一个阴森的大宅，经历一连串精彩刺激的冒险！有一个名叫 Warlock 的魔法师预谋想要毁灭世界，狗狗们在善良幽灵狗的帮忙下，必须跟万圣节猎狗展开竞争，才能适时阻止灾难的发生。跟之前的"狗狗＂系列相同，本片是由 Anna McRoberts 和 Robert Vince 共同制片，由 Robert Vince 担任执导，而剧本同样由 Robert Vince 和 Anna McRoberts 所完成，小狗的配音随着童星成长也陆续换人了，而本片中演出的角色则包括有 Sierra McCormick 、Harland Williams 、Elisa Donovan 、Sage Ryan …等等。本片的配乐依然是由 Brahm Wenger 所负责。Disney's irresistible talking puppies are back in an all-new movie that takes them far across town to a mysterious mansion where something very spooky is going on. With the help of some unexpected new friends -- including a friendly ghost -- this exciting adventure is howling-good Buddy fun. In a race against a no-good hound, the Buddies and their new friends, Pip, Zelda, Rodney and Skip, must stop Warwick the Warlock -- and save the world from his dastardly deeds. Overflowing with action, humor, and a bag full of bonus features, Spooky Buddies is a spooktacular adventure that treats you to a celebration of friendship and teamwork your whole family will enjoy.It's Halloween, and Disney's irresistible talking puppies are back in an all-new movie that takes them far across town to a mysterious mansion where something very spooky is going on. With the help of some unexpected new friends, including a friendly ghost, this trick-or-treat adventure is howling-good Buddy fun.In a race against the Howlloween Hound, the Buddies and their new friends, Pip, Zelda, Rodney and Skip must stop Warlock the Magician and save the world from his dastardly deeds.
